    ChangeLog

    1.2.0 － 2015.09.09
    • It supports TCP tunneling
    1.1.0 － 2014.10.11
    • Dial-up VPN: when checking and modifying accounts, passwords hidden by default, supports manual display.
    • Dial-up VPN: support can be configured to communicate between the client, single account multiple clients simultaneously online.
    • Dial-up VPN: configurable communication protocol "UDP" or "TCP".
    • Update document describes, increase network environment Classic case scenarios.
    1.0.0 － 2014.09.05
    • The first release that supports IPSec VPN, dial-up VPN, SNAT function.
